title: Octonions and Super Lie algebra
abstract: We discuss how to represent the non-associative octonionic structure in terms of the associative matrix algebra using the left and right octonionic operators. As an example we construct explicitly some Lie and Super Lie algebra. Then we discuss the notion of octonionic Grassmann numbers and explain its possible application for giving a superspace formulation of the minimal supersymmetric Yang-Mills models.
